title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 301.13 - Hearing on documents only
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 301.13 - Hearing on documents only

State Regulations

If the hearing is on documents only, all documents shall be submitted to the
administrator no later than 30 days from the filing date. The arbitrator shall render a timely decision based on all documents
submitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
301.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
